I have loved this game since I played it back in 1999 and having it forever on Steam... Nostalgia can be relived anytime.
When my son is old enough, he will be able to see where his FPS games come from.
worst game ever. reccomend

Da Best...
Muy buen juego quisa uno de mis favoritos, recomiendo completamente jugar el modo historia ya que aparte de historia y accion tiene muchos secretos y su modo multiplayer no esta nada mal
